name: Alien Venture
description:
ALIEN VENTURE

Description:

Alien Venture is a simple indie game made with pygame.

Storyline:

A group of aliens got lost in this unknown universe. Can you help them find the way out?

Objective:

Get the character through all the levels (use a gold key to open the door) and collect as many coins as possible. 

Instructions:

Use arrow keys to move the character and press [esc] to exit the game.

Message:

Leave a comment to let me know what do you think of Alien Venture. Feel free to add any suggestion for improvement and report any bug you encounter. It is the first completed game I've ever made, so I'd like to receive some feedback for future updates and other projects.
